patthana21.48:4.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.48:5.1: Naāsavavippayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.48:5.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.48:6.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.48:7.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.48:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
